nodes.text: The Altora system was located in the Outer Rim Territories' Dalonbian sector. It contained a single sun that was orbited by the terrestrial planet Altora. The planet's surface featured plains and savannahs covered in tall grasses that were home to the altagak, a species of predatory reptilian quadrupeds.
The Altora system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-3.
